name: LinkCycle LLC
overview:
LinkCycle, founded at MIT, revolutionizes environmental data collection, analysis, and sharing, for your products and services. Follow 3 simple steps of Strategize, Measure, and Integrate, through our consulting and software solutions, to discover the easiest path to environmental sustainability. For more info visit linkcycle.com or email at info@linkcycle.com.

Specialties: Life cycle assessment, Sustainability informatics, Sustainability software, Environmental consulting
